title: snowstorm sivir
body: i accidentally deleted my snowstorm sivir skin shard any way to get it back?

replies.body:
When you say delete, do you mean you disenchanted by mistake?  If you disenchanted, unfortunately, there is nothing we can do about that >.<  

I wish I could be the bearer of better news or could help more.  Always be careful and vigilant when you are deciding an action with a shard!
Yea I accidently deletedone skin shard too, so I'd like to know answer to this too :((
